info.title: @tartware/core-service API
info.description: Rooms domain service for Tartware PMS

get.summary: Get a room by ID with optional recommendation scoring
get.description: Returns a single room by ID. When recommendation context (check_in_date, check_out_date) is provided, includes recommendation_score and recommendation_reasons.

get.summary: Search available rooms for a date range

get.description: List rates for a tenant, with optional filters for property, room type, status, and rate type. Results are ordered by priority (ascending).

post.description: Create a new rate for a room type. Rate code must be unique per property.

delete.description: Soft delete a rate by ID.
